definition: The practice of maintaining cleanliness and promoting good health through various measures, such as personal care, sanitation, and cleanliness of surroundings. It is commonly associated with routines and practices aimed at preventing the spread of diseases and maintaining overall well-being.

examples.german: Hygiene ist wichtig für die Gesundheit.

examples.english: The hygiene regulations must be followed.

examples.german: Sauberkeit und Hygiene sind eng miteinander verbunden.
examples.english: Cleanliness and hygiene are closely related.
The hygiene measures have been intensified.
The hygiene standards need to be improved.
